name: # MovingLives
text: Friendly service. Good Food!

name: Nguyen Nguyen
text: The pizza tasted OK though it was almost too oily to eat. Staff members were nice. Bathroom and waiting areas were quite dirty. Not sure how often is dusted or mopped. Window ledges were filthy. Maybe just order to-go if possible.

name: Loyd Trammell
text: The pizza is good....other than that, there are reasons this place closed down.

name: Candace George
text: This is always my favorite pizza parlor it has a buffet for noon time and friendly staff

name: Vivian Guerrero Jr
text: Pizza was good ..restaurant had germex in front of register very convenient for all the customers coming in..employees greeted me in a nicely manner.

name: robert gonzales
text: I ask for pepperoni and jalapenos one would have thought that you would get a jalapeno on every slice but they're must be a shortage

name: bigcrabrob
text: Small location next Burger King has great staff and EXCELLENT pizza in my experience.  I usually order in store, not sure it would matter though.  I only recently ordered here and had not tried Pizza Hut for at least 10 years before.  The crust was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside and slightly sweet tasting.  Good stuff!

name: Chason Granger
text: My pizzas were amazing. Thanks yall

name: Patsy West
text:
Ordered online wanted contactless carryout was suppose to be 10-20 minutes arrived 25 minutes later sat in front of the location for 10 minutes. Even texted Hut once there and no one came so ended up having to go inside to pick up my
order

name: zarek kirkland
text: Garbage pizza amd fast service

name: Mark Durmon
text: Hot and ready pizza with good specials

name: Angelina Booker
text: Great pasta...

name: Austin Maloney
text: Best pizza hut I've ever had. Crust was the perfect level of crispy and it took no time to order and pick it up!

name: A. Anonymous
text: Ordered a spinach mushroom chicken parmesan maybe got a piece of chk on each slice and a pinch of spinach and a pinch mushrooms all over really disappointed. I'm not sure why I can never get napkins at this location either.

name: Carley Belle
text: This place was ok. Pizza was good.

name: Lora Talbert
text: Fast, many items choose for 5$ each

name: Boyce McElveen
text: Well we had a fairly disappointing experience but I decided to give four stars because the manager made an attempt to make it right by crediting us back $20. We had a $60 order. We were told it would take a half an hour. It arrived at …More

name: Bryanna Camann
text: Worst Pizza Hut ever!!! Took 2 hours for my pizzas to get here, both pizzas were cold and taste like cardboard I will never order pizza from here again

name: Joseph Tager
text: Perfect

name: Gina Childs
text: Been way over an hour.. still waiting funny part I order all the time.. first time husband does our address don't isn't real.... Ugh.. I guess we wait

name: Beverly Knoebel
text: Great deals just need to beable to call the store.

name: Rick Bingham
text: Very inconsistent, mostly overcooked dried out pizza.. Actually felt sick after eating there tonight. Would not recommend this place to no one

name: Lenora Holst
text: forgot half the  delivery  we live in Vidor to pine forest. So it took  her there and back 25 min

name: Linda West
text: Everything is great. We get delivery but the two employees that we need to communicate with have great manners. The pizza or whatever we order is always hot and delicious.  Thank you Pizza Hut.

name: Cunt Bitch
text: Best manager and service in town guarenteed. Jammie the manager is the best. I recommend this pizza hut for any family wanting to eat out.

name: Judy Foy
text: Wet dough

name: BillY Lee Furbee jr
text: Good service Good pizza

name: Joshua Finnefrock
text: The food is just like I remember it growing up... tasty and delicious.  However, that is the problem,  if I had the same tastes as then this would be great but it ranks 3rd in Vidor because my family does not like the food.  Often I have …More

name: Bryan James
text: Ordered 2 pizzas on 3-15-17, at 7:45 pm. Was told the delivery time would be 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Told them that was not a problem. As I write this review, it is now 11pm, and Pizza Hut is closed for the evening. I never received my pizzas, …More

name: Chloe Tanton
text: Woman working ALONE did awesome and was swamped with oders!! She needs and deserves a raise!!!

name: Juliann Bell
text: It's a great place to work

name: Amanda Simonic
text: Great pizza great service!

name: Hoffman Harold
text: Good sometime...lol

name: Patty Rosas
text: Very unprofessional, this store doesnt understand customer loyalty. After spending hundreds of dollars at this store, I will no longer be doing business with them at all. Pizza Hut has gone to hell

name: charlie briscoe
text: Ordered 1 large supreme and 1 large pepperoni and Italian sausage but they gave me 2 large supreme

name: Lacy Guidry
text: Love my Pizza Hut, they always have my order right and on time.

name: Derek Compton
text: Best manager and pizza in town, and in every pizza hut I've been to

name: Meagan Garrett
text: If you ever want free pizza, call and tell them they messed up. This store sends out a redo with no questions asked as long as you get a certain manager. They give out more free pizza than all the other stores in the area combined. Pizza is same as all the others so pretty good but management is poor.

name: Victoria Jones
text: Always a good experience!. Manager has no problem fixing something if there is a mess up

name: Steven S. Smith
text: Delivery is too slow. Plus I like dominos thin crust. New York pizza is best.

name: zack nicholas
text: The employee I spoke to on the phone didn't know anything about how to process an order, after describing my order to her for about 15 min (a single 2 topping pizza) I gave up.

name: Crystal Coutee
text: Food an hot

text: The manager stayed open during hurricane Harvey to feed people until the last minute! She did it all with no crew too!
